title: Who has the world's largest sports contract? - Quora

response.answer_text: $503,000,000 - No. 1 biggest contract in sports history belongs to Kansas City Chiefs Quarterback PATRICK MAHOMES. $426,500,000 -No. 2 would be Los Angeles Angels Baseball player -MIKE TROUT.
Probably whatever broadcasting rights deal is held by FIFA, as soccer (football) is the most popular sport worldwide. If you mean, a contract for an individual player, that needs to be specified.
This has been asked (and answered) hundreds of times. Check this out for example: Who has the highest paid contract in sports history?
